introduction_japanese: 昇るは、太陽や月、煙や気球などが上に上がるときや、地位や給料が上がるとき、階段や舞台に上がるような場面でよく使う動詞です。
introduction_english: The verb のぼる is commonly used when the sun, moon, smoke, or a balloon goes up, and also in situations like getting a promotion or a pay raise, or when going up stairs or onto a stage.
meanings: to rise (naturally) — e.g. the sun, moon, smoke, mist, balloon
to ascend into the sky (spiritual/metaphorical) — e.g. ascend to heaven
to climb/go up (physical places) — e.g. stairs, observation deck, stage
to be promoted / to rise in rank or salary
meaning_explanation_japanese: 「のぼる」は、物や人が下から上へ動くことに使います。自然に上がるもの（太陽や煙）や、階段を上がるような物理的な上昇、そして地位や給料が上がるとき（昇進・昇給）にも使います。
meaning_explanation_english: The word のぼる means to go up or ascend. You can use it for things that naturally rise (like the sun or smoke), for physically going up (stairs or a stage), and for rising in rank or pay (promotion, pay raise).

common_words: 昇給 (しょうきゅう): pay raise

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means rise up. It shows the idea of going higher or upward. For example, しょうしん means promotion and uses this idea of rising in rank, and しょうきゅう means pay raise and uses the idea of a salary going up.
synonyms: 登る : のぼる : to climb (often with effort)
上がる : あがる : to rise; to go up (general)
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the のぼる are のぼる and あがる. のぼる (as a synonym) emphasizes climbing or going up with effort, while あがる is more general and means to rise or go up.
antonyms: 降りる : おりる : to go down, descend
下がる : さがる : to fall, drop, go down
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the のぼる are おりる and さがる. おりる means to go down (physically descend), and さがる means to fall or decrease (for position, price, level).

example_sentences.furigana: 太陽(たいよう)が昇(のぼ)る。

translations.MY: နေထွက်သည်။

example_sentences.furigana: 朝日(あさひ)が昇(のぼ)る。

translations.ES: El sol de la mañana sale.
translations.VI: Mặt trời buổi sáng mọc lên.
translations.FR: Le soleil du matin se lève.
translations.MY: နံနက် နေထွက်သည်။
မီးခိုးတွေတက်လာတယ်။

example_sentences.furigana: 気球(ききゅう)が昇(のぼ)る。

translations.MY: မီးပုံးပျံ တက်လာသည်။

example_sentences.furigana: 階段(かいだん)を昇(のぼ)る。

translations.MY: လှေကားကိုတက်ပါ။

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)の位(くらい)が昇(のぼ)った。

translations.VI: Cấp bậc của ông được tăng lên.
translations.MY: သူ့ရာထူးက တက်လာတယ်။

to rise (naturally) — e.g. the sun, moon.TL: tumaas (natural) — hal. ang araw, buwan, usok, ambon, lobo

EN: to ascend into the sky (spiritual/metaphorical) — e.g. ascend to heaven
